alert.note: Alert for Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Southern Sangre de Cristo Mountains (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 20 at 2:37PM MST until February 21 at 7:00PM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM TO 7 PM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Northern and Southern Sangre de Cristo Mountains. * WHEN...From 8 AM to 7 PM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs may be blown down. Expect strong crosswinds on area roadways.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Southern Sangre de Cristo Mountains
